ðŸ“– Summary: Dockerify Android provides a Dockerized Android emulator with support for multiple CPU architectures, offering native performance and seamless ADB & Web access. It allows developers to efficiently run Android virtual devices (AVDs) within Docker containers, facilitating scalable testing and development. Key features include a web interface, root access with Magisk, PICO GAPPS, and scrcpy support.
